name: Floating Jade, Treasure of Chenyu
desc: Little Mao seems to have some information about how to help heal Chenyu Vale...

customize.name: Qiaoying of the Sacred Mountain
customize.desc: On first arriving at Chenyu Vale, you are asked by the adeptus, Fujin, to help investigate imbalances in the local water and soil…

customize.name: Chenyu's Blessings of Sunken Jade
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following the request of Fujin, an adeptus, to resolve the disharmony of Chenyu Vale's soil and water.

customize.name: Qiaoying of the Sacred Mountain
customize.desc: On first arriving at Chenyu Vale, you are asked by the adeptus, Fujin, to help investigate imbalances in the local water and soil…

customize.name: Floating Jade, Treasure of Chenyu
customize.desc: Little Mao seems to have some information about how to help heal Chenyu Vale...

customize.name: An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade
customize.desc: Help the Adeptus Fujin complete a ritual that will heal the land of Chenyu Vale.

customize.name: The Cloud-Padded Path to the Chiwang Repose
customize.desc: Paimon is a bit worried about Adeptus Fujin’s condition. If you have time, it might be good to pay another visit to Chiwang Terrace.

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Achievements</color>
Spirits Adrift, Alas, in Water
Jade, O Jade, Grant Me My Wish...

customize.name: Little Mao
customize.desc: A child from Qiaoying Village and Lingyuan's friend.
